example.util

Class ConveyerBelt

  • java.lang.Object
    • example.util.ConveyerBelt

  • public class ConveyerBelt
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConveyerBelt(int maxWeight)
      a ConveyrBelt is defined by a maximal authorized weight

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accept(Box box)
      checks if this belt can accept the given box : it is not too heavy
      void display()
      displays boxes carried by this belt
      void emptyBelt()
      empty this belt : removes all boxes
      int getMaxWeight()
      returns the maximal authorized weight
      boolean isFull()
      tells if belt is full
      void receive(Box box)
      a box is put on this belt, an exception is thrown if this belt is full or added box is too heavy

        public int getMaxWeight()
        returns the maximal authorized weight
        Returns:

      • receive

        public void receive(Box box)
        a box is put on this belt, an exception is thrown if this belt is full or added box is too heavy
        Parameters:
        box - the bow put on the belt
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if box is too heavy
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this belt is full

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        tells if belt is full
        Returns:
        true iff this belt is full

      • accept

        public boolean accept(Box box)
        checks if this belt can accept the given box : it is not too heavy
        Parameters:
        box - the box
        Returns:
        true if box is not too heavy else false

      • display

        public void display()
        displays boxes carried by this belt
